summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Chintan news app. Backend APIs working excellently (93.8% success rate). All major frontend features functional including horizontal swipe navigation, back button fix, notifications system, poll history, and professional onboarding. Mock news data (12 realistic Indian articles) serving correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 405 (Method Not Allowed) instead of 401 (Unauthorized) for GET requests without auth
minor_bugs.impact: Very minor - doesn't affect functionality, just HTTP status code inconsistency

design_issues.issue: Breathing animation effect not clearly detectable in CSS classes during testing
design_issues.note: Button is present and functional, just animation detection unclear

passed_tests: Login page loads with Google sign-in button
Backend /api/notifications endpoint works (returns empty notifications)
Backend /api/users/voted-polls endpoint works (returns empty polls)
Feed page shows 9 articles with mock Indian news data
Article page has horizontal swipe hint text 'Swipe left/right'
Article page back button correctly goes to /feed (not previous article)
Developing page route /developing works and loads properly
Profile page shows Poll History button
Profile page shows Weekly Report button
Profile page has Edit button for interests
Onboarding page has professional design without emojis
Onboarding page has 8 category options (exceeds minimum 3 requirement)
Developing Stories appears as single breathing button in sidebar
Notifications button present and functional
Backend API health check passes
12 realistic Indian news articles served correctly
All authentication and protected routes working
AI questions endpoint working (max 3 questions)
Poll endpoints functional
Article detail pages load with all required sections (what, why, context, impact)
